text.text_translated: Chloe has two pet rats named Zena and Roxy, and she knows they are not typical pets. She has lost count of the times she has tried to explain to people that rats are not dirty and that they make fantastic pets if you look after them correctly. However, she understands why people react badly, because she did not like rats either until her friend Martin showed her his own pets and she saw how affectionate and intelligent they were. Last year, when one of Martin's rats had babies, Chloe decided she wanted to have two of them.
